name: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing
summary: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing is a cartoon style boxing beat 'em up with plenty of strange looking characters to choose from and beat the hell out of them. You can train your character up to the best of his/her ability and then fight the best in the world for the championship belt.
info:
• 开发: Midway Studios San Diego (Midway Games)
  • 发行: Midway Games
  • 平台: DC
  • 平台: PS
  • 平台: N64
  • 平台: GBC
  • 游戏类型: FTG
  • 游玩人数: 1人，多人
  • 发行日期: 1999年9月9日（DC 北美）
  • 其他发行日期: 1999年10月31日(N64/PS)
